S04bsu014_u:2520: te bhūmya saptasu viśodhita prajñupāyā mārgā susaṃbhṛta mahāpraṇidhānabaddhāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2521: supratiṣṭhitā naravarāḥ kuśalopapetā jñānābhilāṣi vidu aṣṭamimākramanti // 12 //
S04bsu014_u:2523: śrutadharma niścitabalopagatā maharṣī kṣāntiṃ labhanti anutpādapraśāntisūkṣmām // 13 //
S04bsu014_u:2524: ādāvajāta anutpāda alakṣaṇaṃ ca asaṃbhūtatamavinaṣṭata cāpravṛttam /
S04bsu014_u:2526: te eva kṣāntisamanvāgata niṣprapañcā gambhīracālya vidu śāntavicāraprāptāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2530: svapnoghaprāpta pratibuddha tathāvikalpā brahmāpure ratisaṅgarahito tathaiva // 16 //
S04bsu014_u:2531: pūrvādhiṣṭhāna sugatā puna codayanti eṣā sa kṣānti paramā sugatābhiṣeke /
S04bsu014_u:2533: asmāku jñāna vipulaṃ varabuddhadharmā te tubhya nāsti ta hi vīryu samārabhāyam // 17 //
S04bsu014_u:2534: kiṃcāpi śānta tava sarvakileśajvālā jvalitaṃ niśamya puna kleśagatibhya lokam /
S04bsu014_u:2535: praṇidhāna pūrva smara sattvahitaṃ vicārya jñānārthi prārthita kriyā jagamokṣahetoḥ // 18 //
S04bsu014_u:2536: sada eṣa dharmata sthitā tathatāvikalpā sarveṣu buddhajinaśrāvakapratyayānam /
S04bsu014_u:2537: na hi etinā daśabalāna prabhāvu loke nānyatra jñānavipulaṃ tribhi adhvasaṅgam // 19//
S04bsu014_u:2538: evaṃ tamapratisamā naradevapūjyā upasaṃharanti bahujñānamukhā vicārān /
S04bsu014_u:2539: jinadharmaniṣpattipraveśamanantapāraṃ yasyā kalā na bhavate puna bodhicaryā // 20 //
S04bsu014_u:2540: etāni prāpta vṛṣabhī varajñānabhūmim ekakṣaṇena spharate diśatāḥ samantān /
S04bsu014_u:2541: jñānapraveśupagatā varabhijñaprāptā yatha sāgare vahanu mārutayānaprāptaḥ // 21 //
S04bsu014_u:2542: sābhogacittavigatāḥ sthitajñānakarma vicinanti kṣetraprabhavaṃ vibhavasthitiṃ ca /
S04bsu014_u:2543: dhātuścatvāri vinibhāgagatāna tāṃśca sūkṣmaṃ mahadgata vibhakti samosaranti // 22 //
S04bsu014_u:2544: trisahasri sarvaparamāṇurajo taranti catvāri dhātu jagakāyi vibhaktitaśca /
S04bsu014_u:2545: ratnā vibhaktiparamāṇu suvargatīṣu bhinditva jñānaviṣayena gaṇentyaśeṣam // 23 //
S04bsu014_u:2546: jñāne vibhāvitamanā vidu sarvakāyān sve kāyi tatra upanenti jagārthahetoḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2547: trisahasra sarva ca spharitva vicitrarūpān darśenti kāya vividhān tathanantaloke // 24 //
S04bsu014_u:2548: sūryaṃ śaśiṃ ca vahni māruta antarīkṣe svakamaṇḍalusya udake pratibhāsaprāptā /
S04bsu014_u:2550: jñānottame sthita tathācaladharmatāyāṃ jaga śuddha-āśaya vidū pratibhāsaprāptā // 25 //
S04bsu014_u:2551: yatha-āśayaṃ jagata kāyavibhaktitāṃ ca darśenti sarvapariṣe bhuvi sarvaloke /
S04bsu014_u:2552: vaśipratyayāśraya jinātmajaśrāvakānāṃ darśenti te sugatakāya vibhūṣitāṅgān // 26 //
S04bsu014_u:2553: sattvāṃśca kṣetra tatha karmavipāka kāyān āryāśrayān vividhadharmajñānakāyān /
S04bsu014_u:2554: ākāśakāya vṛṣabhī samatāmupetaṃ darśenti ṛddhi vividhān jagatoṣaṇārtham // 27 //
S04bsu014_u:2555: vaśitā daśo vimalajñānavicāraprāptā anuprāpta jñānakṛta maitrakṛpānukūlāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2557: ye cā balā jinasutāna daśa akṣobhyā tehī upeta avibandhiya sarvamāraiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2559: ima bhūmideśupagatā na guṇānamanto no śakyate kṣayitu kalpasahasrakoṭyaiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2560: te bhūya buddha niyutān samupāsayante bhonto utapta yatha bhūṣaṇu rājamūrdhni // 30 //
S04bsu014_u:2561: ima bhūmideśupagatā vidu bodhisattvā mahabrahma bhonti sahasrādhipatī guṇāḍhyāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2563: ekakṣaṇena daśakṣetraśataḥsahasrā yāvā rajodhātu tattaka samādhyupenti /
S04bsu014_u:2564: paśyanti tattaka daśadiśi sattvasārān bhūyo ataḥ praṇidhiśreṣṭha vyūha nekāḥ // 32 //
S04bsu014_u:2582: imi sarve jinasutā khilamalavigatā upagata bhuvi varasuruciracaraṇāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2583: jagahita vicarati daśadiśa vṛṣabhī darśayi jinacari khagasamamanasā // 7 //
S04bsu014_u:2584: narapuri marupuri bhujagapativiṣaye viyuha daśadiśi puṇyabalamudīritāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2585: tata tu bhuyu jinasuta darśayi atulī jinasutaprabhava jinanupathaniratā // 8 //
S04bsu014_u:2586: ekakṣetri acalita sarvakṣetravirajā anugata jagahita śaśiriva pratibhā /
S04bsu014_u:2588: yatra sattva hīnacitta dīna mānaniratāstatra vidu śrāvakācarī deśeti vṛṣabhī /
S04bsu014_u:2589: yatra sattva tīkṣṇacitta pratyayānaniratāstatra jñāna pratyayāna darśayanti virajā // 10 //
S04bsu014_u:2590: ye tu sattvahitamaitramanasā (abhiratās) tatra tyaṃ(tvaṃ) jinaputrāna darśayanti caraṇam /
S04bsu014_u:2591: ye tu sattva agra śreṣṭha matimānaniratāstatra amī buddhakāya darśayanti atulam // 11 //
S04bsu014_u:2593: māyā yathā māyakāro darśeti jagahite yāya koṭi naikavidyā sarvabhāvavigatā /
S04bsu014_u:2594: eva vidū buddhasutā jñānamāyaniratā darśayanti sarvacarī sarvabhāvavigatā // 12 //
S04bsu014_u:2595: etādṛśā rutasahasrān bhaṇitva madhurāṃstadā marukanyakā jinaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇīṃbhūtāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2596: parṣadviprasanneyamavocatsugatātmajam aṣṭamāyā bhaṇa ūrdhvaṃ cariṃ saddharmarājinām // 13 //
S04bsu014_u:2598: te apramāṇabalabuddhi vicārayantaḥ susūkṣmajñānaparamā jagatā durjñeyā /
S04bsu014_u:2599: tatha guhyasthāna sugatāna samosaranto bhūmiṃ kramanti navamīṃ jagato 'rthakarīm // 14 //
S04bsu014_u:2600: te dhāraṇīmukhi samādhisamāhitāgrā vipulā abhijñā api kṣetrapraveśanantam /
S04bsu014_u:2602: te atra bhūmyanugatā jinakośadhārī kuśalāśca dharmakuśalāśca avyākṛtāśca /
S04bsu014_u:2603: ye sāsravā api ca laukika ye ca āryāścintyā acintiya vidū anubuddhyayanti // 16 //
S04bsu014_u:2605: bhūmidharma yathā-adhimukti pracārataśca abhisaṃskaronti yatha lokya tathotaranti // 17 //
S04bsu014_u:2606: te evajñānanugatā varasūkṣmabuddhī sattvāna cittagahanaṃ parimārgayanti /
S04bsu014_u:2607: (cittaṃ vicitrakṣaṇavartanivartatāṃ ca) cittaṃ anantaprabhavaṃ sada otaranti // 18 //
S04bsu014_u:2609: tatha karmapraveśa vicitravibhaktitaśca hetū niruddhaphalanāśa samotaranti // 19 //
S04bsu014_u:2611: indriya yā mṛdukamadhya udārataśca saṃbhedapūrvamaparānta samotaranti /
S04bsu014_u:2612: adhimukti naika vividhā śubha āśubhataśca catvāri āśīti sahasra samotaranti // 20 //
S04bsu014_u:2613: dhātūpraveśa jaga bhāvitakleśadṛṣṭī gahanaṃ gatā anavarāgra acchedataśca /
S04bsu014_u:2614: ye āśayā anuśayā sahajapracārī cittāsamosṛta nibaddha accheda tanti // 21 //
S04bsu014_u:2615: cittaṃ yathā anuśayā na ca dravyabhūto na ca deśasthā na ca vipravasanti āśayā /
S04bsu014_u:2616: durheya dhyānaviṣayānabhivartiyāśca chedaśca mārga vinayena na cānyamasti // 22 //
S04bsu014_u:2617: upapatti ṣaḍgati vibhaktipraveśataśca snehaṃ ca tṛṣṇamavidyāndhaka karmakṣetrā /
S04bsu014_u:2619: te vāsanāgati kileśa ca karma cittā suvihāratāya na punargatisanta kāmā /
S04bsu014_u:2621: evaṃ visaraṇagatāḥ sthita atra bhūmyāṃ sarvasattva āśaya yathendriya yādhimuktiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2622: teṣāmarthe dharmavibhakti prakāśayanti pratisaṃvidarthakuśalāḥ pratibhā nirukti // 25 //
S04bsu014_u:2623: te dharmabhāṇaka gatī anuprāpta (sthānaṃ) siṃhariṣabhanibhā girirājakalpāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2624: abhipravarṣanti madhuramamṛtasya varṣaṃ bhujagendrasāgara yathā anupūrayanti // 26 //
S04bsu014_u:2626: te dhāraṇī daśa asaṃkhyasahasra labdhā dhāranti dharma yatha (sāgara varṣadhārī) // 27 //
S04bsu014_u:2627: evaṃ ca dhāraṇiviśuddhisamādhiprāptā ekakṣaṇena daśabuddhasahasra dṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2631: toṣenti sarva yathaindriya-āśayāśca catudvīpasāgara varṣā sama modayanti // 29 //
S04bsu014_u:2632: (bhūyottariṃ guṇinu vīrya samārabhante) citta-anti vālaprasara asmi sucetanantāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2633: deśeyu dharma sugatāḥ puna nānasattvaṃ śrutvā dharema yatha sarvada (bījadhārī) // 30 //
S04bsu014_u:2634: (yāvatakā) jagadiha praviśanti sattvāḥ (te sarva ekapariṣanmaṇḍale niṣaṇṇāśca) /
S04bsu014_u:2635: eṣāṃ ca ekakṣaṇi sarvi samotaritvā ekāṃ rutena imi tarpayitavya sarve // 31 //
S04bsu014_u:2636: (atra sthitā naramaruttama dharmarājā) bhontī dharmairjinasutāḥ paricālayanti /
S04bsu014_u:2637: rātriṃdivaṃ sada jinaiḥ śamathānuprāptā gambhīra śānta sthita jñānavimokṣadhīrā // 32//
S04bsu014_u:2639: tasya kleśagahanāni prabhā samājya brahmaṇo va dvisahasrikalokadhātuḥ // 33 //
S04bsu014_u:2642: (kṣetrāpramāṇaparyāpanna) ekā rajāgre kṣaṇi eki (tattakasamādhi u)penti dhīrāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2643: (dṛṣṭvā sarve diśi jināṃśca vacaḥ śṛṇonti) tato vikurvi praṇidhānanvitāpramāṇāḥ // 35 //
S04bsu014_u:2644: ityeṣā navamī bhūmirmahājñānavicāriṇā / gambhīrā durdṛśā sūkṣmā nirdiṣṭā sugatātmajāḥ // 36 //
S04bsu014_u:2653: vastrakaiḥ samakarī sagauravā bhrāmayanti rucirān varān śatam // 3 //
S04bsu014_u:2654: apsarā bahava prīṇitendriyāḥ pūjayanti sugataṃ sagauravāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2656: ekakṣetra sugato niṣaṇṇakaḥ sarvakṣetri pratibhāsa darśayī /
S04bsu014_u:2658: ekaromu sugatasya raśmayo niścaranti jagakleśa śāmyati /
S04bsu014_u:2664: garbhaprāpta bahukṣetrakoṭiṣu jāyamāna kvaci kṣetra dṛśyate // 8 //
S04bsu014_u:2665: niṣkramanta jagahetu nāyako budhyamāna puna bodhimuttamām /
S04bsu014_u:2667: māyakāra yatha vidyaśikṣito jīvikārtha bahukāya darśayī /
S04bsu014_u:2671: yatha svabhāvu sugatānagocarā sarvasattva tatha prāpta dharmatām /
S04bsu014_u:2673: ye tu jñāna sugatāna arthiṃke kalpakalpaparikalpavarjitam /
S04bsu014_u:2676: marukanyā jinaṃ lokya tūṣṇībhūtāḥ śame ratāḥ // 14 //
S04bsu014_u:2681_0: atha khalu vajragarbho bodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ vyavalokya sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ vyavalokya
S04bsu014_u:2681_1: dharmadhātuṃ ca vyavalokayan sarvajñatācittotpādaṃ ca saṃvarṇayan bodhisattvaviṣayamādarśayan
S04bsu014_u:2681_4: evameva bhūmyarthaṃ prarūpayamāṇo buddhānubhāvena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu014_u:2685: khilamanavidhutānāṃ mārgajñāne sthitānāṃ śṛṇuta cariviśeṣān bodhisattvāna śreṣṭhān // 17 //
S04bsu014_u:2686: kuśalaśatasahasraṃ saṃciyā kalpakoṭyā buddhaśatasahasrān pūjayitvā maharṣīn /
S04bsu014_u:2690: yāva jina triyadhvā pūjanārthāya pūjaṃ khagapathapariṇāmaṃ śodhanaṃ sarvakṣetram /
S04bsu014_u:2691: samyaganugatārthe yāvatā sarvadharmān mokṣa jagata arthe jāyate bodhicittam // 20 //
S04bsu014_u:2698: pracalitaśubhakāryā dhīravīryotsahā ye nikhilajanahitārthe prodyayāmāna siṃhāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2700: avirataguṇasādhyā nirjitakleśasaṃghā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 24 //
S04bsu014_u:2702: śamasukhaniratā ye tyaktasaṃsārasaṅgā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 25//
S04bsu014_u:2704: jinapadaśaraṇasthā labdhatattvārthakā ye sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 26 //
S04bsu014_u:2706: sugataguṇasamīhā ye ca puṇyānurāgāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 27 //
S04bsu014_u:2707: tribhuvanahitakāmā bodhisaṃbhārapūrye praṇihitamanasā ye duṣkare 'pi caranti /
S04bsu014_u:2708: avirataśubhakarmaprodyatā bodhisattvāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 28 //
S04bsu014_u:2710: anugataśubhamārgā labdhadharmārthakāmā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 29 //
S04bsu014_u:2711: iti gaṇitaguṇāṃśā bodhicaryāścarantu jinapadapraṇidhānāḥ satsamṛddhiṃ labhantu /
S04bsu014_u:2712: triguṇapariviśuddhā bodhicittaṃ labhantu triśaraṇapariśuddhā bodhisattvā bhavantu // 30 //
S04bsu014_u:2785: dharmameghāṃ tataḥ prāpto maheśvaro bhavet kṛtī // 65 //
S04bsu014_u:2794: tathā bodhiṃ śivāṃ prāpya caturmārān vijitya ca /
S04bsu014_u:2801: etāstāḥ khalu punarbho jinaputrā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ samāsato nirdiṣṭāḥ sarvākāravaropetasarvajñajñānānugatā draṣṭavyāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2802: tasyāṃ velāyāmayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat /
S04bsu014_u:2806_0: atha tasmin samaye bhagavāṃstān vimukticandrapramukhān sarvān bodhisattvānāmantrya
S04bsu014_u:2806_2: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi paramayā parindanayā /
S04bsu014_u:2807: tadyūyaṃ sarve svayaṃ caivamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayata, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayata /
S04bsu014_u:2808: saṃkṣepānmārṣā yadi tathāgataḥ kalpasthitikenāyuḥpramāṇena rātriṃdivamadhitiṣṭhamāno 'sya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S04bsu014_u:2812: evameva mārṣā ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
S04bsu014_u:2813_0: parṣanmadhye ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati - anena cittena kathamamī sattvā evamudāradharmasya
S04bsu014_u:2813_1: lābhinaḥ syuriti śraddhayā satkṛtya śrāvayiṣyanti śroṣyanti ca yoniśo manasi bhāvayiṣyanti ca /
S04bsu014_u:2814: pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati /
S04bsu014_u:2815: amātsaryacittatayā asya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā likhanāya vācanāya svādhyayanāya pūjanāya darśanāya dāsyati,
S04bsu014_u:2817: atha khalu bhagavānasyaiva dharmaparyāyasya bhūyasyā mātrayā anuparindanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu014_u:2818: sattvā dṛṣṭā ye mayā buddhadṛṣṭyā te 'rhantaḥ syuḥ śāriputreṇa tulyāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2820: pratyekabuddhāya tu yaśca pūjāṃ kuryādahorātramapi prahṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2822: sarve 'pi pratyekajinā yadi syustān pūjayet kaścidihāpramattaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2825: ekasya yaścaiva tathāgatasya kuryāt praṇāmamapi caikavāram /
S04bsu014_u:2826: prasannacitto 'tha vadennamo 'rhan tasmādidaṃ śreṣṭhataraṃ ca puṇyam // 4 //
S04bsu014_u:2827: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvāstān pūjayet yaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
S04bsu014_u:2828: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānuṣaiśca kalpānanekān bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ // 5 //
S04bsu014_u:2829: yaścaiva saddharmavilopakāle tyaktvā svakāyaṃ ca tathātmajīvam /
S04bsu014_u:2830: dadyādahorātramidaṃ hi sūtraṃ viśiṣyate puṇyamidaṃ hi tasmāt // 6 //
S04bsu014_u:2832: dṛḍhaṃ samutpādya sa bodhicittam idaṃ sadā sūtravaraṃ dadātu // 7 //
S04bsu014_u:2834: gṛhe sthitastasya tathāgataḥ sa tiṣṭhedidaṃ yatra hi sūtraratnam // 8 //
S04bsu014_u:2835: prabhāṃ sa prāpnoti śubhāmanantām ekaṃ padaṃ vādi śatīhayaśca /
S04bsu014_u:2836: na vyañjanād grasyati nāpi cārthād dadāti yaḥ sūtramidaṃ parebhyaḥ // 9 //
S04bsu014_u:2837: anuttarāsau naranāyakānāṃ sattvo na kaścit sadṛśo 'sya vidyate /
S04bsu014_u:2838: bhavetsamudreṇa samaśca so 'kṣayaḥ śrutvā hi yo dharmamimaṃ prapadyate // 10 //
S04bsu014_u:2839: According the edition by Ryūkḥ Kondḥ (reproduced Kyoto 1983) the end of the sūtra is:
S04bsu014_u:2840_0: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te vimukticandrapūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvagaṇā vaśavartidevarājapramukhāḥ
S04bsu014_u:2840_2: ca lokaḥ sā sarvāvatī parṣad bhagavato vajragarbhasya bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
S04bsu014_u:2842: iti śrībodhisattvacaryāprasthāno daśabhūmīśvaro nāma mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ samāptaḥ //
S04bsu014_u:2843: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
S04bsu014_u:2844: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
